pages.text: The $(l:using/altar)Natural Altar$() can be useful for infusing certain items with the power of $(aura), however, it can also assist in transmuting items from one type into another.$(br)This can be achieved by creating the Transmutation Catalyst and placing it on top of any of the four lower $(item)Golden Stone Brick$() blocks around the altar, and then placing the ingredient on the altar as usual.
